pages.text: Now that you have successfully summoned your first spirit it's time to look at your next steps as a magician and start to plan for the long term.

pages.title: Craft Golden Chalk
pages.text: Obtain gold dust and glowstone dust and craft golden chalk for infusion and possession rituals.

pages.title: Craft Otherworld Goggles
pages.text: Prevent an Demon's Dream addiction by switching to $(l:rituals/crafting/craft_otherworld_goggles)Otherworld Goggles$(/l)$() for Third Eye vision.

pages.title: Summon Possessed Mobs
pages.text: Possessed mobs are controlled by spirits, allowing the summoner to determine some of their properties. They usually have high drop rates for rare drops, but are generally harder to kill. Start by summoning a $(thing)Possessed Endermite$() to obtain endstone to craft purple chalk.

pages.title: Dimensional Storage
pages.text: Among the advanced uses of spirits is the controlled creation and interaction with dimensions, which allow to store great amounts of items. Start by infusing a dimensional matrix and go from there. Now the sky is the limit - use stable wormholes as additional access points, storage accessors to remotely access your items and create storage stabilizers to maximize available space.

pages.title: Autocrafting
pages.text: The final step for ultimate comfort is to summon machine operator Djinni to manage furnaces and other machines for you. Their book of calling allows to set their managed machine and home storage system, then you can give orders using the storage system GUI.
